name: Free Comic Con Demo
description:
Dream of Darkness is a Lovecraft+Aztecs adventure for PC. In 1518 you sail to the New World, only to find something awakening. We're telling real history mysteries based on the advice of historians and archeologists, with a cosmic horror twist.

Could games become better if studios listened to players? Before building our 3D game for PC, we shipped our 2D narrative prototype to listen to your feedback, double down on what you love, as well as scrap what is not valuable to you. 

Our 3D prototype is coming! Stay tuned at our newsletter:

http://dreamofdarkness.com 

Play the full version of this demo!

https://dreamofdarkness.itch.io/dreamofdarkness
